status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.customfield_10312: Sticky reply form display and interact according to the ticket.Â
fields.description:
+*Objective*+
 * Expose more content above the fold to improve engagement metrics.

Â 

+*Implementation*+
 * To expose more contentÂ ATF, we won't have sticky reply form when user land on VIP.
 * Sticky reply form will surface only when user reach a pre-determined position on the page. (refer to mock-up)
 * Sticky reply form will fix at a pre-determined position above related ad as reply isn't the main call to action after reaching that point.Â (refer to mock-up)
 * This implementation will cut across both RE VIP/ non RE/ ND Landing Page

Â 

+*Mock-up*+
 * RE VIP Mobile - [~qblanchais]Â please help to update zeplin once it's done
 * ND Landing pageÂ Mobile -Â Â [~qblanchais]Â please help to update zeplin once it's done
 * Animation - attached.Â 

Â 

+*AB testing set-up*+
 * Control group - current version.
 * Testing group - version in this ticket.
 * Measurement plan - [~ropetrescu] please update the google doc link here once it's done.Â 

Â

comments.body: [~qblanchais] please attached the animation in the attachment.Â
[~ropetrescu] please help to do the pre analysis. thanks.Â

dev 3 points

qa manual testing 1 point automation 1 point
Test pass, code has merge to master
confirm we won't test non RE VIP.

concur we will test RE VIP and ND Landing Page only.Â 

[~john]Â [~aparambath] we should consider migrate non RE VIP to the VIP template. for your consideration.
